title: Ron & Gail Bennington Join Big Jay Oakerson to talk to Nick Foles of the Philadelphia Eagles & Michael Che Stops In
description: On this week's Best of The Bonfire, Jay and Dan meet a hot Instagram model outside The Village Underground in NYC. Despite her being very "L.A." towards the Bonfire executive producer, Christine just might be in love. Then, you won't want to miss it as die hard Philadelphia Eagle's fans Big Jay Oakerson and Gail and Ron Bennington interview Superbowl winning quarterback Nick Foles. Finally, SNL's Michael Che stops by the Bonfire and reads funny World Star Hip Hop comments.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Comedy Central)
